name: Steel Runner
description:
Do Dash and Do Shoot !!!
Steel Runner is Run & Jump game that utilizes the barrage shooting game system.

- Simple controls
- 8 types of various weapons
- 3 skills of character
- 10 types of enemies unit
- 50 unique missions
- Helpful ingame items
- 3 different kinds of modes in onegame
- Bigsize boss units
- Outstanding Artwork
- Original sound and voice
- Supports gamecenter leaderboards and achievements
